subject: 1st Sound Soap Allaphone Experiment
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hey guy's,

Did my first session with sound soap and the allaphone file today.
Caught about 25% of the communication real time. I am using a track 
ball mouse with the program, so the sweep is not the smoothest.

But still in all a very fruitfull 1st run, and I'm only about halfway 
through going over the recording.

Bruce
